134407.「この宮殿の中でのみ 使うことができる\n 封印の聖灰を取り扱っています。\n:
My task is to handle the Sealing Ash, which
can only be used inside this palace.
What is it I can do for you?
<break>

134423.「すでに 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 最大まで 封印しています。\n<brea:
You've already sealed the maximum amount
of effects possible.
<break>

134424.「この効果は すでに封印されています。\n<bw_break>:
This effect has already been sealed.
<bw_break>

134425.「これ以上 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 封印することは できません。\n<bw:
I can't seal off the effects of the War God's
belt any longer...<bw_break>

134426.「封印の聖灰が <%nL_LACK_NUM>個 足りません。\n<bw_brea:
You will require <%dL_LACK_NUM> more Sealing Ash
to seal that.
<bw_break>

134427.選んだ戦神効果を <%nL_SEAL_NUM>種類 封印した！\n<se_not:
The <%dL_SEAL_NUM> effect type(s) you have
chosen have been sealed!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

134429.「それでは 戦神のベルトの効果の\n 封印状態をリセットします。\n<br>\n:
To reset all of your sealed effects, I will require <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash.
In addition, the <%dL_GET_NUM> Sealing Ash you've used so far will be returned do you. Do you want to reset them?

134431.「戦神のベルトの効果を 封印していません。\n<bw_break>:
I've sealed the effects of the War God's
belt...<bw_break>

134432.「封印の聖灰を <%nL_POINT_NUM>個 使って\n 戦神のベルトの効果:
I've used <%dL_POINT_NUM> of your Sealing Ash to reset all of the effects of you currently have sealed.
The <%dL_GET_NUM> Sealing Ash you used to seal those effects has been returned to you.

134848.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を 捧げると\n 封印の聖灰が<:
If you offer that <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>, you
will get <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash. The offered item will
be lost. Are you certain?
<yesno 2><break>

134849.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n 今 装備しているものです:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is currently
equipped. Are you sure you want to offer it?
<yesno 2><break>

134850.「今持っている封印の聖灰は <%nL_TOTAL_NUM>個です。\n 封印の聖:
You currently have <%dL_TOTAL_NUM> Sealing Ash.
I can give you more, but only if you offer an
item to me. Which one will you offer?
<break>

134851.「封印の聖灰は <%nL_MAX_NUM>個までしか持てません。\n 今 <%s:
You can only hold <%nL_MAX_NUM> of the Holy Ashes of the Seal... If I give <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> now, it will only
increase by <%nL_GET_NUM>, is that correct?

134852.<pc>は\n<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を 捧げて\n封印の:
<pc> offered the
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> and received
<%dL_GET_NUM> Sealing Ash!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

134853.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n ロックされていますので\:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked, so you
cannot offer it.
<bw_break>

134854.「残念ですが 封印の聖灰に変えられる\n アイテムをお持ちではないようです。\n:
I'm afraid I don't have any items that can be
turned into holy ashes for sealing.<bw_break>

134855.「これ以上 封印の聖灰を\n 増やすことは できません。\n<bw_break>:
You cannot hold any more Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

139206.「何について 聞きたいのでしょうか？\n<select_se_off>\n封印の:
What do you wish to inquire about?
<select_se_off>
Obtaining Sealing Ash
Belt Effects
Sealing Effects
Resetting Sealing Effects
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case 4>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

158873.「<%sL_ITEM>の効果を ふやしたり\n 入れ替えたりすることが できます:
The effects of your <%sL_ITEM>
can either be replaced or increased.
Which belt do you wish to enhance?
<break>

158875.「他に どの<%sL_ITEM>を 強化しますか？\n<break>:
Are there any others you wish to enhance?
<break>

158877.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は ロックされています。\n 強:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked. Are you
sure you want to strengthen it?<yesno 2><break>

158879.「ベルトの強化に 失敗しました……。\n はじめから もう一度 お試しください。:
I've failed to strengthen the belt. Please
try again from the beginning...<bw_break>

158881.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>が <%nL_KYOUKA_ITEMNUM>:
That will require <%dL_KYOUKA_ITEMNUM> <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>.
You can obtain it from the reward chests
given inside this palace.
<bw_break>

158883.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>と 強化できる\n <%sL_ITEM>を:
You don't have any <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> to strengthen your <%sL_ITEM>.
<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> can be obtained as a reward from the Dark Deity's Palace.

158887.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n これ以上 強化することは:
That <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> cannot be
strengthened any further.<bw_break>

158890.おや……？ なんと <%sL_ITEM>が\n強い光を放ちはじめた……！\n<b:
What's this...? Suddenly, the
<%sL_ITEM> begins to shine brightly!

158891.さらに<%sL_KOUKA>が\n<%sL_CHANGE_KOUKA>に\n変わ:
In addition, the <%sL_KOUKA>
effect has changed to
<%sL_CHANGE_KOUKA>!<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

158892.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に 新たな効果がめざめ\n<%sL:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> has awakened a new effect: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>!
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is now <%sL_ITEM><%sL_RESLT_PLUSNUM>!

158893.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>と\n <%sL_KYOUKA_:
You would like to offer the
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> and the
<%dL_KYOUKA_ITEMNUM> <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>?
<yesno><break>

317256.「封印する効果が なにも選ばれていません。\n<bw_break>:
You haven't selected any effects to seal.
<bw_break>

317576.「封印の聖灰は 『封印の聖灰を増やす』を\n 選んで 特定のアクセサリーを捧げる:
Choosing "Obtain Sealing Ash" will allow you
to offer one of your accessories in exchange
for Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

317922.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>を 持っていません。\n <%sL_KYOU:
You don't have any <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>.
They can be purchased within the DQX
Shop.
<sys_msg><color_yellow>
You can visit the DQX Shop using the
following link:
https://sqex.to/dqxshop
<color_white><sw_msg_mode>

317923.「使用期限内の <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>がありません。\n <%sL_:
You don't have any <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>
that are not expired. You can obtain them
from the DQX Shop.

You can visit the DQX Shop using the

The strengthening of your War God Belt was
unexpectedly interrupted. Allow me to
continue where I left off...

<yesno><break>
